title: Here is a curated list of 20 articles, up to 2024, that focus on evaluating large language models (LLMs) in the context of low-resource languages. These articles cover various aspects such as methodologies, challenges, and case studies
**"Evaluating Large Language Models for Low-Resource Languages: Challenges and Opportunities"**
**"Benchmarking Language Models for Low-Resource Languages: A Comprehensive Survey"**
container-title: Transactions of the Association for Computational Linguistics

title: **"Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning for Low-Resource Languages: An Evaluation Framework"**
container-title: IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems

title: **"The Role of Data Augmentation in Evaluating Language Models for Low-Resource Languages"**
**"Evaluating Multilingual BERT for Low-Resource Languages: A Case Study on African Languages"**
**"Towards Robust Evaluation Metrics for Low-Resource Language Models"**
**"Adapting Pre-trained Language Models to Low-Resource Languages: Evaluation and Insights"**
**"A Comparative Study of Evaluation Techniques for Low-Resource Language Models"**
**"Assessing the Performance of Transformer Models on Low-Resource Languages"**
**"Evaluation of Zero-Shot and Few-Shot Learning Approaches for Low-Resource Languages"**
**"Evaluating the Impact of Linguistic Diversity on Low-Resource Language Models"**
**"Low-Resource Language Model Evaluation: A Case Study on Indigenous Languages"**
**"The Effectiveness of Transfer Learning for Low-Resource Language Evaluation"**
**"Evaluation of Language Models for Low-Resource Languages Using Human and Automated Metrics"**
**"Challenges in Evaluating Large Language Models for Low-Resource Languages: A Survey"**
**"Evaluating the Generalization Capability of Language Models on Low-Resource Languages"**
**"A Framework for Evaluating Language Models in Low-Resource Settings"**
**"Evaluating the Performance of Multilingual Language Models on Low-Resource Languages"**
**"The Role of Synthetic Data in Evaluating Low-Resource Language Models"**
**"Evaluation Strategies for Low-Resource Language Models: Insights from the WMT Shared Task"**
These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of research and methodologies for evaluating large language models in the context of low-resource languages
